article_title: Executive hires, promotions in healthcare 2016: Running list
article_text:
Executive hires, promotions in healthcare 2016; Running list

Hospitals, payers and other healthcare organizations are in a constant state of improvement. The C-Suite is churning through the improvements by developing new skills and adapting to new policies. Healthcare Finance News will be keeping pace with the promotions and hiring in healthcare management throughout the year.

If you have any executive moves to share, email our managing editor at beth.sanborn@himssmedia.com.

Advance to next slide to start gallery.
